reviewText: This is definitely a classic. Not enough scenes, but very real.

This is the only "adult film" I have ever seen where the hard core scenes are not intrusive or yucky! The first ten minutes are so beautifully directed that one might find it hard to believe it's a porno movie. Other so called classics such as The Opening Of Misty Beethoven,The Private Afternoons Of Pamela Mann are good films but after a while the sex scenes become intrusive. The Devil In Miss Jones does not suffer from that problem.
I received my DVD in good time, and enjoyed it very much. I have seen it before, and this is a must-own.
